channel.title: Project 06 npc hp help
channel.description:
hi guys :) !! i got this project 06 source.. ehm and it seems like all npc's in the game has 120 hp :S even a man lvl 2 .. so how do i fix this ? ive been searching around the files and i can't fin a solution :S
please help guys :P ?

item.title: Project 06 npc hp help
item.dc:creator: @klump klump
item.description:
@klump wrote:

[quote=“allstarrevolutionz, post:2, topic:478144”]It would be in the NPC.cfg folder and it should look like this

npc = 13 Wizard 9 14 30

13 = npcid
wizard = npc name
9 = combat level
14 = Health
30 = respawn rate[/quote]

i found the “error”
but now how to fix it ?
its something with the “120” in this command:P

        if (playerCommand.startsWith("npc")) {
            try {
                int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(4));
                if (newNPC > 0) {
                    Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, newNPC, c.absX, c.absY, 0, 0, 120, 7, 70, 70, false, false);
                } else {
                    c.sendMessage("Requested NPC does not exist.");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
            }
        }

how do i do so it takes the ammount of health from the npc file? instead of 120 as it says up there?

Read full topic

item.title: Project 06 npc hp help
item.dc:creator: @allstarrevolutionz allstarrevolutionz
item.description:
@allstarrevolutionz wrote:

It would be in the NPC.cfg folder and it should look like this

npc = 13 Wizard 9 14 30

13 = npcid
wizard = npc name
9 = combat level
14 = Health
30 = respawn rate

Read full topic
